title: Coty Inc Earnings Call scheduled for 9:30 am ET today
text:
Coty Inc Earnings Call (Q4 2015) Scheduled to start Thu, Aug 13, 2015, 9:30 am Eastern 
-- this event is ongoing now-- 
After the event has finished, the audio will be availablefrom this page until Sat, Aug 13, 2016 About Coty Inc (NYSE: COTY ) Other Calls Coty Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, and distributes womens and mens fragrances, color cosmetics, and skin and body care related products worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Fragrances, Color Cosmetics, and Skin & Body Care. It offers various fragrance products under the Calvin Klein, Davidoff, Marc Jacobs, Chloé, Playboy, Balenciaga, Beyoncé, Bottega Veneta, Guess?, Lady Gaga Fame, Roberto Cavalli, and Katy Perry brands; and color cosmetics products, including lip, eye, nail, and facial color products under the OPI, Rimmel, and Sally Hansen brands. The company also provides skin and body care products comprising shower gels, deodorants, skin care, and sun treatment products of adidas, Lancaster, and philosophy brands, as well as offers its products under the Astor, Coty, Jovan, Joop!, Manhattan, N.Y.C., and New York Color brands. In addition, Coty Inc. offers a portfolio of color cosmetic products under the Bourjois brand. It sells its products through retailers, including hypermarkets, supermarkets, independent and chain drug stores and pharmacies, upscale perfumeries, upscale and mid-tier department stores, nail salons, specialty retailers, and duty-free shops, as well as traditional food, drug, and mass retailers. Coty Inc. was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in New York, New York. More Info:
